branchCategory.name: VHK
branchCategory.description: <p>Finger valve series VHK has a large effective area of 2.0 to 17.5mm&sup2;.  This series begins with a minimum tube O.D of &oslash;4.  The valve  direction clearly indicates whether the valve is open or closed (shut to open is counter- clockwise).  Classification of knob by color difference facilitates distinction between 2 port valves (gray) and 3 port valves (blue). The optional flame resistant model's knob, whether using the 2 or 3 port valve, is red.</p>

branchItem.name: 90-VHK*, Finger Valve
